title: Trump-Newsom engage in 'high-stakes' clash of political heavyweights
shortDescription: Trump said Newsom should be arrested. The California governor is initiating a lawsuit against the Trump administration. Their rivalry goes back years.

title: Where DOGE goes now with the Trump-Musk alliance shattered
shortDescription: President Trump said DOGE's work is "not finished at all" after his relationship with Elon Musk blew up in spectacular fashion last week.

title: Trump's military parade preparations underway as tanks arrive in DC
shortDescription: A massive military parade will take place in D.C. on June 14 to mark the Army's 250th anniversary, which falls on President Trump's birthday.

title: RFK Jr. fires entire CDC vaccine advisory committee
shortDescription: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. ousted all 17 members of a panel that advises the CDC on the safety, efficacy and clinical needs of vaccines.

title: Going to Trump's DC parade? Expect scans, drones. No pets.
shortDescription: Officials gave a preview of what to expect at the Army's 250th birthday celebration and military parade.

title: Trump pressed on Musk using drugs in White House: 'I hope not'
shortDescription: Reporters asked Trump if he was away of Elon Musk using drugs in the White House. The president replied he didn't know but added, 'I hope not.'

title: Is Musk ready for a détente with Trump? X posts reveal new stance
shortDescription: Two days after Musk dropped a bomb on his friendship with Trump, the mercurial billionaire appeared to be rethinking his decision.

title: Trump scores in polls on immigration, as LA protests rage
shortDescription: In recent polls, voters are more likely to approve of the president's immigration policies than his handling of other major issues.

title: Cash for kids: Trump touts plan for babies' investment accounts
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is pushing a program that would create and put his name on investment accounts for babies if the GOP tax bill becomes law.

title: Trump says he'd arrest California governor Newsom
shortDescription: The dare and double-dare between Newsom and the Trump administration comes after the president ordered the National Guard into Los Angeles.

title: Latinas for Trump founder criticizes 'inhumane' immigration arrests
shortDescription: Ileana Garcia, who co-founded Latinas for Trump, criticized Donald Trump’s recent immigration enforcement actions as “unacceptable and inhumane."

title: Army deletes video of tanks over 'Hang Fauci & Bill Gates' graffiti
shortDescription: The Army deleted a video from its social media that showed a tank en route to the June 14 parade on a train car spray-painted with the death threat.

title: Watch: Trump stumbled up the stairs to plane, similar to Biden trip
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was climbing the stairs of Air Force One. The Trump campaign used a video clip of Biden stumbling in multiple camapign ads.

title: What is the Insurrection Act? Here's what Trump has said about invoking it
shortDescription: Trump's National Guard deployment to Los Angeles and recent comments signal more sweeping executive actions are possible. Is the Insurrection Act one of them?

title: Trump appears to stumble on Air Force One steps
shortDescription: President Donald Trump appeared to trip while boarding Air Force One, moments after addressing reporters in Morristown, New Jersey.

title: Protesters respond as Trump's immigration raids disrupt daily life
shortDescription: As President Trump delivers on his promise to deport millions of immigrants, tough, new tactics are being met with growing community resistance.

title: CA officials take on Trump over National Guard
shortDescription: California officials accuse President Donald Trump of inflaming protests by mounting a federal response.

title: What is Trump's current approval rating? See the polls
shortDescription: Presidential approval ratings show Americans' views during each term. See how the latest polls rated Donald Trump and how they compare to past terms.
